languages.text: "Конечно. Всеотец даровал мне честь испить мьод скьяльдов. Я сложил тысячу вис для своих братьев — ретивых и гордых, зовущих к битве, ранящих сердце в кровь и веселых, словно хохот безумца, у которого отобрала разум зимняя метель".

"Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."
languages.original_text: "Конечно. Всеотец даровал мне честь испить мьод скьяльдов. Я сложил тысячу вис для своих братьев — ретивых и гордых, зовущих к битве, ранящих сердце в кровь и веселых, словно хохот безумца, у которого отобрала разум зимняя метель".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand visur for my brothers — visur of passion and pride, calls to battle, visur that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: “当然了，全父赐予了我吟游诗人的天赋。我为我的兄弟们创作了几千首传说诗篇，有关于激情、骄傲与战斗的诗篇，有刺痛人心的诗篇，还有欢快振奋的诗篇，仿佛在寒冬的风暴中，疯子们失去理智的狂笑声。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

traits.locale_text: “当然了，全父赐予了我吟游诗人的天赋。我为我的兄弟们创作了几千首传说诗篇，有关于激情、骄傲与战斗的诗篇，有刺痛人心的诗篇，还有欢快振奋的诗篇，仿佛在寒冬的风暴中，疯子们失去理智的狂笑声。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: 「当然だ。全知の父はスキャルドのミードを食する名誉を俺に与えてくれた。兄弟たちのために数えきれないほどの詩を作曲してきた――情熱と誇りの詩、戦への呼びかけ、心に突き刺さる詩、そして冬の嵐に正気を失った狂人の笑いのような陽気な詩ー…」
languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

traits.locale_text: 「当然だ。全知の父はスキャルドのミードを食する名誉を俺に与えてくれた。兄弟たちのために数えきれないほどのヴィザーを作曲してきた――情熱と誇りのヴィザー、戦への呼びかけ、心に突き刺さるヴィザー、そして冬の嵐に正気を失った狂人の笑いのような陽気なヴィザー…」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: «Por supuesto. El Padre de todas las cosas me concedió el honor de degustar el mjod de los skjalds. He compuesto mil estrofas para mis hermanos. Estrofas de pasión y orgullo que llaman a la batalla, estrofas que hielan el corazón y otros alegres como la risa de un loco a quien una tormenta invernal ha arrebatado la cordura».
languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. El Padre de todas las cosas me concedió el honor de degustar el mjod de los skjalds. He compuesto mil visur para mis hermanos. Visur de pasión y orgullo que llaman a la batalla, visur que hielan el corazón y otros alegres como la risa de un loco a quien una tormenta invernal ha arrebatado la cordura».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: « Bien entendu. Le Père de Tous m'a accordé l'honneur de goûter au mjod des skjalds. J'ai composé des milliers de vers pour mes frères. Des vers parlant de passion et d'orgueil. Des appels à prendre les armes. Des vers qui transpercent le cœur et d'autres, aussi joyeux que le rire d'un homme qui aurait perdu la raison au cours d'une tempête de neige. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu. Le Père de Tous m'a accordé l'honneur de goûter au mjod des skjalds. J'ai composé des milliers de vísur pour mes frères. Des vísur parlant de passion et d'orgueil. Des appels à prendre les armes. Des vísur qui transpercent le cœur et d'autres, aussi joyeux que le rire d'un homme qui aurait perdu la raison au cours d'une tempête de neige. »
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: "Natürlich. Der Allvater gewährte mir die Ehre, den Mjod der Skalden zu kosten. Ich habe tausend Verse für meine Brüder komponiert – Verse voller Leidenschaft und Stolz, Rufe zur Schlacht, Verse, die das Herz durchbohren, und auch fröhliche, wie das Lachen eines Wahnsinnigen, der seinen Verstand durch einen Wintersturm verloren hat."
languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Der Allvater gewährte mir die Ehre, den Mjod der Skalden zu kosten. Ich habe tausend Visur für meine Brüder komponiert – Visur voller Leidenschaft und Stolz, Rufe zur Schlacht, Visur, die das Herz durchbohren, und auch fröhliche, wie das Lachen eines Wahnsinnigen, der seinen Verstand durch einen Wintersturm verloren hat."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

languages.text: "Tabii ki güzel. Yücebaba, bana skjaldların mjodundan yudumlama onurunu bahşetti. Kardeşlerim için binlerce mısra besteledim. Tutku ve gurur dolu mısralar, savaş çağrıları, yüreğimi delip geçen dizeler, kışın fırtınada aklını yitiren bir delinin kahkahası gibi eğlenceli olanlar..."
languages.original_text: "Of course. The Allfather granted me the honour of tasting the mjod of the skjalds. I have composed a thousand verses for my brothers — verses of passion and pride, calls to battle, verses that pierce the heart, and merry ones, like the laugh of a madman who lost his sanity to a winter storm."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki güzel. Yücebaba, bana skjaldların mjodundan yudumlama onurunu bahşetti. Kardeşlerim için binlerce mısra besteledim. Tutku ve gurur dolu mısralar, savaş çağrıları, yüreğimi delip geçen mısralar ve kışın fırtınada aklını yitiren bir delinin kahkahası gibi eğlenceli olanlar..."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
